name: Jake Miller
title: Jake Miller - Web Developer
subtitle: Web Developer
description: Web developer with front-end and back-end expertise. ReactJS, NodeJS, and more.

quotes.quote: By Grabthar’s hammer, by the suns of Worvan, you shall be avenged.
quotes.author: Convention Attendee

quotes.quote: I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Attack ships on fire off the shoulder of Orion. I watched C-beams glitter in the dark near the Tannhäuser Gate. All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain. Time to die.
quotes.author: Roy Batty

quotes.quote: You’re going to need a bigger boat.
quotes.author: Sheriff Brody
Captain James Tiberius Kirk
quotes.source: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan
